DOC.brief_summary: The prevalence of chronic pain after a thoracotomy is around 48 %. This research focuses on the surgical approach. The posterolateral approach is compared to the axillary approach especially in term of development of a chronic pain.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of the Surgical Approach on the Development of a Chronic Pain After Thoracic Surgery
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing thoracic surgery intervention by posterolateral or axillary thoracotomy, having no exclusion criteria for the study, planned surgery by thoracoscopy or extended surgery, mental disability, vulnerable person within the meaning of French law, inability to communicate by phone, poor understanding of French.
